title: Annotations and Reflection Quiz
description: Test your understanding of Kotlin annotations and reflection basics.

questions.question: Which annotation target specifies that an annotation applies to a property?
questions.explanation: AnnotationTarget.PROPERTY targets Kotlin properties. FIELD targets the JVM backing field, which is different from the Kotlin property.

questions.question: How do you get the KClass of an object at runtime in Kotlin?
questions.explanation: obj::class returns the KClass of the runtime type in Kotlin. getClass() is the Java reflection approach.
